constraints.name: region_size
constraints.description: 每个区域的大小必须为 5（即五连块）

constraints.name: adjacent_difference
constraints.description: 相邻区域不能有相同的形状
constraints.formal: ∀ adjacent regions R1, R2, shape(R1) ≠ shape(R2)

constraints.name: shape_transformations
constraints.description: 允许旋转和镜像，但视为相同形状

constraints.name: grid_coverage
constraints.description: 网格必须被完全覆盖，且每个单元格属于一个且仅一个区域
constraints.formal: ∪ all regions R = grid, and ∀ cell c, ∃! region R, c ∈ R
